TopicTitle: Choose your super power, then have it trivialized

Articles.Content:
Granted. You're in jeopardy, But not the game show. I'd stay away from the windows if I were you.

The ability to sense danger before it happens.

as long as it does not involve ladders

the ablity to turn a businessman with a suitcase into a alpaca so AL-PACa it for for him

The business man happens to be a lawyer. He promptly sues you.

I want to be able to cause puns to stop.

Now you won't be able to stop buns.

I want strong echolocation.

It only works in padded rooms, where there are no echos.

I wish I could turn into a fence.

as long as it is permanent

the power to turn skip time

for a few seconds.

I want infinite flight.

As long as it is in vacuum

I want Lazors for eyes

As long as it is low powered and it burns u.

I wish to control fire

Sorry, Aang takes away your bending

I wish to control metal and earth

Well,you screwed earth's balance in the iron core (not to mention you stopped the core spinning)

I wish I had the ability to make machines in the image of what thought by standing near metal.

The only metal you can use is Lawrencium

I wish I could move matter with my mind

well your brain is matter to so well umm... it is not pretty i can tell you that.

I wish i can turn CO2 into O2
Nevermind.

but how would you evermind the nevermind?

I would like to have the power to animate faster in blender

well lets say this doesn't end pretty.

I wish i had the power to take over peoples arms over the internet.

But only the left arm.

the ability to generate electrical fields out my nose

Well lets say you brain hit the overcapacity zone ,and I do think most of know what happens when capacitors go beyond the limit.

I want to ability to move planets.

Granted. You accidentally Move the Earth into the sun.

I wish that my Molten Metal Jacuzzi had controls for the temperature.

well lets say things aren't pretty for you once you get in

I wish i had the power to move continents.

You can only move the continent of sealand.

I wish for the power to look into Rage's mind.

Only if he/she/it is not thinking.

I want blood bending.

Only if he/she/it is not thinking.

I want blood bending.

...

What are you suggesting?

Only if he/she/it is not thinking.

I want blood bending.

Sorry, don't understand.

Walk through walls!

Ur power goes away when u get inside a wall and get stuck their.

I wish to control time. Like fast forward, pause
